H0.text: Which word completes the name of the rock band 'Half Man Half...'. Cookie

H1.text: Which word completes the name of the rock band 'Half Man Half...'. Robot

H2.text: Which word completes the name of the rock band 'Half Man Half...'. Animal

H3.text: Which word completes the name of the rock band 'Half Man Half...'. BISCUIT

A4.text: Half Man Half Biscuit were championed by DJ John Peel, for whom they recorded twelve sessions
